title: Is there opportunity to localize text?

comments.author: Hulkmaster.1724
comments.body: I’ve created petition in case you’re looking if fan community is interested in that feature https://www.change.org/p/arena-net-add-custom-localization-possibility-in-guild-wars-2?recruiter=308657517&utm_source=share_for_starters&utm_medium=copyLink

comments.author: OlafKS.7904
comments.body:
+100500
As an admin of the ru fansite, I think I can speak on behalf of the entire ru community (ok – biggest part of it ) – we have a lot of players who are not playing because there is no localization (and they really want to play!). And we have enough people to translate texts for other players… but there is no possibility to add them in to the game.
Yes, last reply that I received by mail was “unfortunately we do not allow fan translations”. And I lost hope already, but maybe… maybe… well, no, I have no hope.)
I’m pretty sure that the answer will be the same (please, tell me I’m wrong)

comments.author: Hulkmaster.1724
comments.body:
Hello!

I know question is not about api, but that’s most technical forum here

I’ve searched forum for my answer, but didn’t find it.

Is there any opportunity to make custom localize files and use them as ingame subtitles, for example?

i think there are big communities, which want to help people, who don’t know english very well, so they could play and join them in game!

or, at least, is there anything we could use in client right now, and not get perma banned? )
